short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A gamified ai-companion to help you be more productive. Focus timers, task tracking, encouragement, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tori are AI-partners designed for high school and college students struggling with attention. People with ADHD that also love to game.

👾 Ready to level up? Finish your goals with a partner that care's about them as much as you.

1️⃣ Click  "Add to Chrome"
2️⃣ Login and choose a Tori 
3️⃣ Create/import your tasks
5️⃣ Start your task in a solo/multiplayer focus session
4️⃣ Repeat, gain XP and evolve.

✨🚀 🧬 🏅 Optimize your potential with your own AI-sidekick!  With Tori, focus on what matters, level up your skills and become superhuman ⚡Now with Gpt-4o!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🛡️ Safe, Secure & Private:

We take your privacy seriously. Tori is designed with your safety and security in mind.  That's
why we collect minimal data, only to make Tori more effective for you. Your data is never shared
or sold, and you always have full control over your information.  

(Required) ✉️ Email Authentication : Your email is used solely to securely sign you into your Tori
account.

 (Optional) 🧠 Personalized Adaptation: To help Tori understand your preferences and tailor
support to your specific needs, we offer the option to share:

          💬 Message History: This allows Tori to remember your conversations, making
                 interactions feel more natural and helpful.

         ⏳ Focus Session Insights: By understanding which distractions affect you most during
                focus sessions, Tori can proactively suggest strategies and interventions to help you 
                stay on track.

Your data is yours. You can easily opt out of personalized adaptation at any time, and we never
share your data with third parties. We are committed to protecting your information and
empowering you to control your Tori experience.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🌟FEATURES

      🛡️Safe, Secure & Private: Rest assured knowing your safety and privacy come first.

      🎯Plan, schedule, and conquer tasks with your AI sidekick! Defeat procrastination, 
           boost focus, and level up your productivity game.

      🤖 AI-Vision capabilities: Show your work, get AI assistance, and watch your ideas 
            come to life. 

      🙌Emotional encouragement & inspiration: Stay motivated even when things get tough. 

      📵Block out distractions: Say goodbye to pesky notifications and stay laser-focused. 

     🏆 AI-Leveling System: Grow and evolve alongside your AI partner as you conquer 
           new challenges and achieve your goals.

     🤝Social accountability: Join multiplayer focus sessions and level up together. 

     🔥Personalized quests: Embark on unique challenges to master new skills (coming soon!). 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🔥 Why Choose Tori?

    💯 Inspired by Solo Leveling: Tori combines the best of AI, education, and 
          gaming to create a unique and engaging experience.

    🧠 Personalized AI Advantage: Tori adapts to your individual needs and goals, 
          providing tailored guidance and support.

    🎓 Built for Students & Professionals: Tori helps you master your attention and 
           achieve superhuman focus, whether you're studying or working.

    🚀 The Future of Self-Improvement: Tori is at the forefront of Leveling AI-Systems,
           revolutionizing the way we learn and grow.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
